definitions: each of the 100 equal groups into which a population can be divided according to the distribution of values of a particular variable.
shortDefinitions: each of 100 equal groups into which population can be divided according to distribution of values of particular variable

definitions: each of the 99 intermediate values of a random variable that divide a frequency distribution into 100 groups
shortDefinitions: each of 99 intermediate values of random variable which divide frequency distribution into 100 such groups
